name: Kahiora 2020
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In a peaceful universe, invaders have come to steal your life-sustaining resource! Absorb, control and transform it in order to destroy them!

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Number of players: 1

Producer: Marine CARIO & Maxime de LAVALLEE
Game Art: Ophélie BRAUN, Adrian CLEVINGER, Romain COSTE & Clément FAURE
Game Design: Fabian DURANDET, Clément PAYEN & Victor WATHIER
Game Design & Programming: Maxence BEAUMONT
Game Programming: Martin GARNIER, Morgan HOARAU, Jannah MEKHAEMAR, Aurel PIERRE & Maxime ROUFFET
Music & Sound Design: Léo CAILLAC

https://twitter.com/Kahiora
Soundcloud: https://bit.ly/2MTbpkc
